  • Constructor Details

    • SessionController

      public SessionController()
      Creates a new CustomTableModel for hour entries and sets header titles. Calls method to query needed data and sets renderer properties for table. It also calls the methods to fill dropdowns with information.

  • Method Details

    • queryData

      public void queryData()
      Queries needed data for displaying hour entry information. Formats everything to Strings except start and end times. This information is stored as actual "Date" object, for making it possible to filter for time periods.

    • actionLoadProjects

      public void actionLoadProjects()

    • actionLoadServices

      public void actionLoadServices()

    • actionLoadClients

      public void actionLoadClients()

    • actionLoadProjectsNewEntry

      public void actionLoadProjectsNewEntry()

    • actionLoadServicesNewEntry

      public void actionLoadServicesNewEntry()

    • getSessionView

      public SessionView getSessionView()

    • actionFilterEntries

      public void actionFilterEntries()
      Reads data given by user to filter with. If filters are filled out, this method adds them to a List of Row Filters. It then applies these filters with an AND operation on the table data.

      Filters:
      Projectname
      Client
      Service
      From (Date)
      To (Date)

    • getTableModel

      public CustomTableModel getTableModel()

    • actionSaveEntry

      public void actionSaveEntry(boolean editingExistentEntry)
      Sets view to read userinput data from depending on given argument. Reads userinput from view, validates it and then updates or inserts data to database (also depending on boolean argument).

      If this method is called through an action fired by an "edit view", it updates the data in the database (argument = true).
      If this method is called through an action fired by the "new entry" view (normal tabbed pane) it inserts new data (new entry is being created).

      Parameters:
      editingExistentEntry - Set 'true' if existent hour entry data should be edited and not being newly created.

    • createLocalDateTime

      private LocalDateTime createLocalDateTime(Date date, String time)
      Creates a LocalDateTime object from Date object for day and a String representing a time in format HH:mm
      Parameters:
      date - Date object containing the wanted day.
      time - String in HH:mm format.
      Returns:
      Parsed LocalDateTime

    • createDateFromString

      private Date createDateFromString(String dd_MM_yyyy)
      Creates a Date object from a given String in format dd-MM-yyyy.
      Parameters:
      dd_MM_yyyy - String in format dd-MM-yyyy
      Returns:
      Date object

    • calculateMinutesBetweenLocalDateTimes

      private int calculateMinutesBetweenLocalDateTimes(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Calculates the minutes between two given dates (LocalDateTime) rounded to minutes.
      Parameters:
      start - LocalDateTime of start
      end - LocalDateTime of end
      Returns:
      Integer representing the amount of minutes between dates.

    • calculateMinutesFromHourFormat

      private int calculateMinutesFromHourFormat(String pause)
      Calculates minutes from a String in format HH:mm.
      Parameters:
      pause - String in time format HH:mm
      Returns:
      Integer representing the amount of minutes.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener

    • sumDuration

      private void sumDuration()
      Gets all visible duration values from column "Dauer" and calculates a sum.
      This sum is then displayed under the JTable.

    • resetFieldsNewEntry

      private void resetFieldsNewEntry()
      Resets all fields in the "new entry" tab to their defaults.

    • deleteSelectedMethod

      private void deleteSelectedMethod()
      Reads information from selected table row and asks for confirmation. When confirmed, this method deletes the selected hour entry from database and re-queries data.

    • openEditDialog

      private void openEditDialog()
      Opens edit dialog for selected hour entry if a table row is selected.

      Reads data from the selected table row and places it intro the user input fields (pre fillout).

      The view is generated from the input form panel defined in the class 'SessionView'.
      To work slightly different, this method changes the fired actions and the appearance of the buttons in this view.

    • resetInputFieldsOverview

      private void resetInputFieldsOverview()
      Resets als input field to their default values.

    • getModel

      public IModel getModel()
      Description copied from interface: IController
      This Interface is used to implement the Strategy Pattern (behavioral). Every view needs to have a controller assigned, that implements this interface. That way different controllers can be used for the same view classes.
      Specified by:
      getModel in interface IController

      public IView getView()
      Specified by:
